Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student may draw two figures that represent people, showing the basic idea of two entities involved in the activity.
The student might draw a single line between the figures, suggesting some awareness of a connecting element, though not necessarily recognizing its purpose as a string or wire.
CANNOT: The student cannot clearly illustrate that the line or string between the students is meant for sound communication (student may think the line is decorative or unrelated).
The student is unlikely to depict the transmission of sound messages between the students *(unclear on concept of sound waves)*.
The student does not demonstrate an understanding of how a string telephone works or depict any sound/light waves *(student may think sound travels through air only)*.
The student does not show the benefits of using such a device for communication *(student may only focus on drawing figures without purpose)*.
